Reviews.Title: *beware* two cameras with the same model numbers
Reviews.Author: AimeeYB
Reviews.Content: I purchased three CAM-CM01-245A cameras.  After getting them set up and installed, I noticed that the audio on two of the three cameras was frustratingly bad.  Upon close inspection of the three cameras I realized that while the packaging for all three cameras indicated the same exact camera, two of the cameras had different model numbers on the internal labeling.The good camera had model number: CAM-CM01-245AThe two bad cameras had model number: CAM-CM01-245ATIt seems to me that they changed something about the camera (especially related to sound quality) and have the old and new cameras on the market marketed under the same model numbers.  If you're lucky enough to get the good one, it's a great entry level security camera.  If you get the other one, don't count on the audio.

Reviews.Title: Troubled Neighbor
Reviews.Author: Mama
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Night Owl Security Camera because I have problems with my neighbor threatening my dog.  I connected the camera to an old tv & VCR so I could record what was going on.  I live in denver and shortly after I installed the camera we had a major snow storm, 18 inches of snow and temperatures got down to 15 degrees.  The camera never missed a beat!  It worked great, video was as good as when it was 80 degrees the week before.

Reviews.Title: pictures go out on camera within a month
Reviews.Author: C. Farley
Reviews.Content: The cameras are ok, bought 3 of them, but the cables included are fragile.  Closed one in the front door and it broke connection and our front door is not sealed very well.  Needed to amend this review.  The picture has gone out on one camera within a month of installation.  The camera is protected, under a roof and two walls shielding it.  That isn't the bad part though.  The company gives you the royal run around trying to get an RMA.  They think that a screen shot that has had snipit used to shrink it for email is a "text/editable receipt".  Five emails to date so just plan on eating the expense of the camera and go with a more reputable brand even if it cost more.

Reviews.Title: Night Owl Cameras
Reviews.Author: luis Hernandez
Reviews.Content: I purchased two Night Owl Cameras for my system since they were less expensive through Amazon than the manufacturer.I returned the first one due to being defective (no video signal), they sent me a replacement one in late August. It worked for two days and now it is no showing signal again. What do I do, return it again?????Same exact thing happened with the second camera, it worked for two weeks and now it is showing same icon "no video signal"??? I again, requested a replacement on the second one and replacement arrived today.Now, I am the point of having purchased two cameras, both have been return for replacement. One have been received and it is not working again and the second replacement arrived today to replace second camera.Are these defective products being sold? I have purchased many items through Amazon, but this experience, it is just totally unacceptable. Stop selling these items or advise manufacturer. Please advise what to do with first camera replaced in late August,  that has been replace already once and it is not working again??????????????To top it off, I ordered a cell phone battery and it also arrived defective. What is going on with the quality of your sellers or items being sold through Amazon???A very Disappointed customer.Sincerely,Luis Hernandez5319 Sandy Shell Dr.Apollo Beach, FL. 33572

Reviews.Title: Highly recommend all Night Owl Security Items
Reviews.Author: Extremely Satisfied with Pink Moose Company
Reviews.Content: Purchased a four camera night owl security system via Amazon and quickly upgraded to the eight camera system. These work very well with proper lighting for the area (night time viewing can be hard to see if there is no enough light for the camera to get a good view) I installed a motion sensor light in the same area and have nothing negative to say about this product.Easy to install by yourself; no professionals needed. And the 24/7 customer support from Night Owl is great. One call and they had me up and running and was able to view all cameras on my television, tablet and mobile phone.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: gotya28
Reviews.Content: We have nine cam-cmo1-245 and they work great! When we got these i hooked one up and there were several lines on the screen so i hooked the other one up and it did the same thing! Two out of two were junk!! I have never had any problems with these cameras in the past but i dont blame night owl. lesson learned when you find a good seller stick with them!

Reviews.Title: Didn't like it.
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: I am sitting here looking at the image on my screen. It is 6:30 P.M. and dark in Los Angeles. It looks terrible. It is not clear and it appears very grainy and over exposed. My bullet cameras work fine, I don't like these night vision cameras. This is the second night vision camera I have purchased and they are horrible quality.

Reviews.Title: Pretty OK
Reviews.Author: W Galligan
Reviews.Content: Pro, easy to install, well built, works well in daylightCon, Doesn't work as well as advertised, night vision is lacking

Reviews.Title: Average
Reviews.Author: Cyndi French
Reviews.Content: This camera is very average.  Good enough picture during daylight, but night-time is poor, perhaps the IR is defective.  I will return it to Night Owl and see what happens.

Reviews.Title: Works in winter weather
Reviews.Author: Catrina Rom
Reviews.Content: I have used this outside a few times in winter weather. Snow blew on it and it still worked great. I attached it to something portable so I could bring it inside. I do not recommend it is left outside in the winter if the temperature gets way below zero and there is a wind chill. Works best in the dark in the winter when there is snow cover, as the snow makes the night vision light up more. I have yet to use this in the spring and summer. If you want this video camera in the winter and the winters get quite harsh like here(western New York), I recommend you attach it to something portable, so it can be brought inside. I sat it on my porch railing and ran the video line through my porch window, underneath the sliding storm window and into the living room.

Reviews.Title: mrd
Reviews.Author: mrd
Reviews.Content: I purchased 4 cameras last November and finally I install them. I love 3 of them during the day and night, but one of them is got a big black circle at night, and Night owl tech support telling me that it is nothing wrong with the camera, and is the DVR.I disconnected the cameras from the DVR and there is the same problem, at night that one camera shows that big black circle and no picture and I would like Amazon to ask them to give me replacement camera.I have to say that this camera is fine during the day, but at night is no good to me.I will be happy to sent that camera the Night owl so they can see if that one camera has no night vision, or they can e-mail me the address where to send it.

Reviews.Title: It's a Night Owl Product so......
Reviews.Author: Phoenecian
Reviews.Content: If you have night owl, then you are familiar with their operation. Strange anomalies aside with random cameras and DVR's, I have had six cameras for over 4 years running flawlessly with one exception. One half of the IR field on one camera has failed, leaving me to move that one to a more naturally lit area to compensate for the lack of night vision distance. Still a pretty good track record, and I am never disappointed with my Night Owl purchases. I am adding more cameras with wide field vision and better color, but these function just fine. Very happy with Night Owl products.

Reviews.Title: SOME SOMEBODY IS WATCHING
Reviews.Author: WAYNE COSTEN
Reviews.Content: GREAT CAMERA  AT A CHEAP PRICE THE DVR THAT CAME WITH THE ORIGINAL SET IS GREAT.GREAT QUALITY EVERYBODY SHOULD GET ONE.

Reviews.Title: Not clear
Reviews.Author: hamiltonmachinist
Reviews.Content: For the price it was okay, I should of ordered a better quality , next time,brand , bad colour ,pay for what you get

Reviews.Title: Very clear
Reviews.Author: Davetgo
Reviews.Content: This camera replaced one tat went out.  The camera picture is much more clear than any of my other cameras looking to replace all my cameras in the coming months.

Reviews.Title: Nice for hallways or narrow views.
Reviews.Author: K. Quaintance
Reviews.Content: This camera has a good daytime/nighttime video with " No audio ".  It's not a wide angle  camera  so I would not use it for your drive way , but  it does have a  good picture  that's not grainy , or snowy.  At night it has better resolution and father line of sight than other more expensive cameras ,  however it's mostly B&W;  , at night.  There is no refund only replacement ,  so make sure this is something you want before you buy.

Reviews.Title: Better camera than the one that came with the original system
Reviews.Author: Leonard Behney
Reviews.Content: This camera is definitely an upgrade from the original cameras that came with my system. Not a super high end camera but a good clear picture for the money!

Reviews.Title: Works as Promised and Described
Reviews.Author: MIGUEL A VILLAVICENCIO
Reviews.Content: I use it to overview a working area in the out side of my shop.  During the day the view is clear  enough for my purpose.  When dark I am able to distinguish the objects and the picture is good enough to see that everything is calm and in place; so I will say that I am very satisfied with the performance of my camera.

Reviews.Title: bad picture through this camera
Reviews.Author: parakkandi bavukka
Reviews.Content: picture from this camera is too bad blurred ... you get  what you paid for right !!we cant really see the people faces

Reviews.Title: Night Owl Security Cam
Reviews.Author: A. Stidham "james leszyeski"
Reviews.Content: This camera did not live up to my expectations at all. It worked well at the beginning, then after a few months (about 5 or 6) it completely lost night vision. After about another month, the camera totally stopped working. I double checked the wires and attachments and nothing seemed to make a difference. On a good note, set-up was incredibly easy. It took about 15 minutes for the entire process. That and the price were really the only 2 good things about the product overall.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: tacmtz
Reviews.Content: Not bad the night seems a little grainy, no wide angle yet it serves it purpose.  Color can go a little off at times, still serves its purpose.

Reviews.Title: defective camera
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Kandle
Reviews.Content: The camera stopped working after only weeks.  I replaced with second I had purchased.  Will see how long this one works?
